name: Idle Story
description:
* STILL IN ALPHA, SOME ELEMENTS CAN CHANGE OR BE ADDED *

Welcome to Idle Story ! The goal ? Click, click and clickagain to earn as much golds as you want !

• Start an adventure, or create you own playground by simply edit game elements (Name of money, clicker image, background, ...).

• Be the richest in Idle Universe

• Fight for victory !

This version may be buggy, ugly and not very functional, but you can download it just for fun , don't forget to report bugs, if you find some bugs :) 

Requirements :

- Windows 7, 8 or 10 (Linux soon ^_^)

- A screen with a minimum of 1280 x 1024 resolution (you can test on smaller resolution).

- 1 GB RAM

- No graphics card ! (Chipset)
